title: Press release - Media Freedom Act enters into application to support democracy and journalism
content:
New rules to better protect journalists, their sources and press freedom in the digital age apply in all EU countries as of 8 August 2025.

Source : © European Union, 2025 - EP

title: Press release - EYE2025 (European Youth Event): 9,000 young people engaged in EU democracy
content:
Around 9,000 16 to 30 year-olds representing 160 different nationalities came together at the Parliament in Strasbourg to discuss the future of Europe at EYE2025 (European Youth Event).
Committee on Culture and Education

Source : © European Union, 2025 - EP

title: Press release - LUX Audience Award 2025: the five finalist films revealed
content:
Animal, Dahomey, Flow, Intercepted, and Julie Keeps Quiet have been shortlisted for the 2025 Lux European Audience Film Award.
Committee on Culture and Education

Source : © European Union, 2024 - EP

title: Press release - “The Teachers’ Lounge” wins the LUX Audience Award 2024
content:
“The Teachers’ Lounge” by German director Ilker Çatak won the 2024 LUX European Audience Film Award on Tuesday, in a ceremony in Parliament’s hemicycle in Brussels.

Source : © European Union, 2024 - EP

title: Press release - 2024 LUX European Audience Film Award: press conference with the winner
content:
A press conference with a representative of the 2024 LUX Award winner will take place on Tuesday, after the announcement at the award ceremony.

Source : © European Union, 2024 - EP

title: Press release - LUX Award: invitation to interview the nominees on 16 April in Brussels
content:
On the day of the ceremony, journalists will be able to interview representatives of the five films shortlisted for the 2024 LUX European Audience Film Award.
Committee on Culture and Education

Source : © European Union, 2024 - EP

title: Press release - Deal on the EU Media Freedom Act
content:
Parliament and Council negotiators agreed on Friday on a new bill to protect EU journalists from growing threats to media freedom and the industry’s viability.
Committee on Culture and Education

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - Music streaming platforms: MEPs ask to protect EU authors and diversity
content:
On Tuesday, the Culture Committee called for EU rules to ensure a fair and sustainable environment for music streaming and to promote cultural diversity.
Committee on Culture and Education

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - Status of the artist: better working conditions for artists and cultural workers
content:
On Tuesday, MEPs adopted their proposals for EU measures to improve living and working conditions for professionals working in the art, cultural and creative sectors.
Committee on Culture and Education
Committee on Employment and Social Affairs

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - European Citizen’s Prize 2023 Award Ceremony
content:
On Tuesday, Parliament will reward European citizens to acknowledge their contribution to European cooperation and the promotion of common values.

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - European Youth Hearing: young people will present their best ideas to MEPs
content:
As a follow up to 2023’s European Youth Event (EYE2023), young people will discuss with MEPs the EYE2023 ideas that gained the most support, in a public hearing on Tuesday.

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - Media Freedom Act: MEPs tighten rules to protect journalists and media outlets
content:
In response to growing threats to media freedom and the industry’s viability, MEPs adopted their position on a law to strengthen the transparency and independence of EU media.
Committee on Culture and Education

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - Gigabit Infrastructure Act: faster rollout of gigabit-capable connectivity
content:
The Industry Committee adopted its position on the "Gigabit infrastructure Act", designed to reduce costs and red tape for the deployment of very high-speed networks.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - Spanish Presidency debriefs EP committees on priorities
content:
Ministers are holding a series of meetings in parliamentary committees to present the priorities of the Spanish Presidency of the Council.
Committee on Foreign Affairs
Committee on Agriculture and Rural Development
Committee on Culture and Education
Committee on Development
Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs
Committee on Employment and Social Affairs
Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety
Committee on Women’s Rights and Gender Equality
Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection
Committee on International Trade
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy
Committee on Civil Liberties, Justice and Home Affairs
Committee on Fisheries
Committee on Regional Development
Committee on Transport and Tourism
Sub

title: Press release - Media Freedom Act: protecting editorial decisions from political interference
content:
The Culture and Education Committee amended the draft bill to make sure it applies to all media content and strengthens transparency and independence of EU media.
Committee on Culture and Education

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - Hearing of Commissioner-designate Iliana Ivanova
content:
The Industry, Research and Energy, and Culture and Education committees questioned Iliana Ivanova, Bulgarian candidate for innovation, research, culture, education and youth.
Committee on Culture and Education
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - LUX Audience Award 2024: five finalists announced in Venice
content:
20 000 Species of Bees, Fallen Leaves, On the Adamant, Smoke Sauna Sisterhood and The Teachers’ Lounge will compete for the 2024 LUX Audience Award.
Committee on Culture and Education

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - “Close” wins the LUX Audience Award 2023
content:
“Close” by Belgian director Lukas Dhont won the 2023 LUX European Audience Film Award on Tuesday, in a ceremony in the European Parliament’s hemicycle in Brussels.
Committee on Culture and Education

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - 2023 LUX European Audience Film Award: press conference with the winner
content:
A press conference with a representative of the 2023 LUX Award winner will take place on Tuesday, after the announcement at the award ceremony.
Committee on Culture and Education

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - The 2023 LUX European Audience Film Award winner to be revealed in Brussels
content:
The winner of 2023 LUX Audience Award will be announced on 27 June in a ceremony at the European Parliament’s hemicycle in Brussels.
Committee on Culture and Education

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - MEPs in Scotland: Brexit has had a fundamental negative impact on education, culture and youth
content:
Upon concluding their visit to Edinburgh on 21 June, MEPs expressed they hope for the UK to revise its decisions to opt out of EU culture, education and youth programmes.
Committee on Culture and Education

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - European Youth Event 2023: young people to discuss Europe’s future in Strasbourg
content:
Around 10,000 young people from the EU and beyond will discuss Europe’s future, against the backdrop of the war in Ukraine and the 2024 European elections.

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - LUX European Audience Film Award: winner to be announced on 27 June in Brussels
content:
The winner of 2023 LUX Audience Award will be announced, for the first time, in a dedicated ceremony in European Parliament’s Brussels hemicycle.

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - 2023 Charlemagne Youth Prize goes to Belgian, Lithuanian and Dutch initiatives
content:
A Belgian app for refugees, a Lithuanian Mobile Climate Museum, and a Dutch platform for young European affairs journalists are the winners of the 2023 Charlemagne youth prize.
Committee on Culture and Education

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP

title: Press release - European Youth Event 2023: programme and registration info for journalists
content:
The European Parliament will welcome around 10 000 young people in Strasbourg on 9-10 June for the European Youth Event 2023.
Committee on Culture and Education

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
